function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease propagation in urban areas","Impact":"Economic losses, closure of businesses, and grounding of transportation","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety protocols, vaccination drives, and targeted lockdown measures","Technologies":"Contactless technologies, remote work solutions, and telemedicine","People":"Urban residents, business owners, and employees","Owner":"Local governments, health authorities, and employers"}]}
